comments: a(n) = Sum_{(x,y): 1<=x<=y<=n, 1=gcd(x,y)} y. Sum_{(x,y): 1<=x<=y<=n, 1=gcd(x,y)} x = (a(n)+1)/2. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 02 2003Equals row sums of triangle A110663. Example: a(4) = 17 = (6 + 5 + 4 + 2), where row 4 of triangle A110663 = (6, 5, 4, 2). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 26 2008
formula: Asymptotically : a(n)=C*n^3 with C=0.2026437... - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 14 2002Asymptotically: a(n) ~ 2/Pi^2*n^3. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 02 2003
crossrefs: Cf. A000010, A002088. Partial sums of A002618.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
